data.title: Vietnamese Specialties
data.text: This restaurant offers a good selection of Vietnamese specialties and is reasonably priced too.  It is closed on Tuesdays.

data.title: I refuse to go back
data.text:
I went there with my wife one night for dinner.  She ordered pho and I ordered a rice platter and thought it would be like the pho from Minneapolis or Saint Paul.  Unfortunately it was a weird flavor and my wife did not like it.  We go to a lot of pho places and this one had very little noodles to soup ratio also very little meat.  In the end she didnt finish her pho.  I had the rice platter, and while it tasted good it came with this salty seafood flavor broth.  It was so salty I couldn't have more than a spoonful.  The meat was okay not seasoned enough and rice cooked well but the salad was not very tasty.

Service was subpar as we had a young girl that looked like in junior high school and didn't know about customer service.  I asked if I could get another broth that was less salty and she brought me another but it was still very salty and unbearable.  

I will not go back and would rather go to St Paul for pho which is a shame because I live so close.

data.title: awesome
data.text: This is the best place in Burnsville. I come here often and never disappointed. The PHO noodle soups are exceptional. The fried rices are outstanding. And now I am going to Saigon Palace for lunch . It is most excellent.

data.title: Roll your own Spring Rolls
data.text: A great place to share a rice noodle platter and roll your own Spring Rolls.Fantastically fresh veggies. pick your meat, or tofu.

data.title: Wanted it to be good, but it wasn't...
data.text: I got takeout, 2 dishes. Food was average to poor. Service was young child at cash register. I like family restarants, but hate it when they have their kids do things like handle the money. Took forever and got home and realized I had been overcharged. I haven't been back. There are far better places.

data.title: Try this little gem
data.text:
Two of us had cold noodle salads that rivaled the ones we had at Quang last week. Didn't try the Banh Mi or Pho this trip, but we'll be back. Fast friendly service, very reasonable prices, surprisingly welcoming decor (not a forte of most of the Asian restaurants we frequent), easy parking...what's not to like? Cheaper than most same-old, same-old chains and infinitely better food.

Go.

data.title: Great food and service!
data.text:
This restaurant was definitely worth trying.  A friend that lives around the corner said they had really good food, so my daughter and I thought we would give it a try.  So we called and ordered our food prior to arrival.

The service provided was friendly and prompt (especially for the foods we added while seated at the table).  I also noticed that there were tons of repeat customers coming in while we were eating.  The staff even acknowledged some of them by name.

The place was small but clean and comfortable.  The parking is decent.

It was definitely worth taking the chance.  We will return.

data.title: Pho Ga and spring rolls. Delicious
data.text: This little hidden gem has great food. Was a little disappointed that it wasn't busy for lunch!  If you haven't been, go. The good is excellent.
